turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, good day, Assistant. Please, I need you to help me place an order for coffee from Starbucks Espresso. I will need an Espresso coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Something small, dark coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not really, which milk preference do you prefer? Give me some options. Any other option?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need options for milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2%, whole milk, soy milk, almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll go for whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: tall coffee with whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, where are you picking it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'll use the Starbucks at 55 Broad Street here in New York.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the Starbucks at 55 grove st.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, bye

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye-bye.
